title: New: Tree – Demons (Feat. Beat Culture & Lena Kuhn)
body:
Not to be confused with Chicago rapper, California’s **Tree** has featured on CitR before, and now appears to truly be spreading his roots, pardon the pun.

With his debut EP **_Demons_** coming out on R&S Records later in the year, he’s dropped the first track to be taken from it, featuring electro-wizard **Beat Culture** and vocalist **Lena Kuhn**. There’s a unique, poetic element to Tree, merging rap influences with his own beats and Yoni Wolf level of story telling prowess. Check out the fantastic _Demons_ below.

_face the demons from my past life_
